title: Carbon Six Digital
description:
• Team management & project development.
  • Outlining best practices and procedures for git, security and deployments.
  • C# .net MVC development, .net framework and .net core.
  • Project delivery using DevOps with build and release pipelines.
  • Azure functions and logic apps development.
  • Umbraco 8 with ModelsBuilder.
  • Migration from Umbraco Cloud to Microsoft Azure Hosting
  • Utilising Vendr for Umbraco to produce an ecommerce site, including contributions.
  • Creation of packages to integrate with HubSpot eCommerce Bridge and TaxJar with Vendr to show sales tax based on shipping.
  • Bespoke build of a product comparison tool, product bundle builder and recommendation tool.
  • Integration of Shopify, including building a JavaScript shopping cart.
  • Integration of MailChimp / SendInBlue for newsletter subscriptions.
  • Using MaxMind / IPStack for geo location services.
  • Building a bespoke personalisation engine for Umbraco based on user's behaviour.
  • nPoco code-first data layer solutions.
  • Hosting utilising Amazon Web Services, Umbraco Cloud and Azure.
  • Azure hosting service management and integration:
    • Virtual Machines, Traffic Manager, App services, SQL servers, Azure CDN, Blob Storage.
  • JavaScript, JQuery, NodeJs, Yarn, NPM, Gulp.
  • HTML, CSS, SCSS, TailwindCSS, Nunjucks
  • Gridsome, Vue.JS, GraphQL, JSON.

title: Jaywing
description:

  • Utilising nPoco and Entity Framework.
  • Working with IdentityServer to connect WebAPI to mobile applications.
  • Integration with Amazon S3 Buckets and Azure Blob Storage

title: Jaywing
description:

  • C# MVC development utilising Umbraco, Sitecore and Sitefinity.

  • Extending Umbraco by creating C# and AngularJS packages.

title: Jaywing
